website_summaries.verdict: It performs well, costs less than $100, and offers a simple setup with native voice-assistant integration.
pros: The Nexx Garage works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant without needing IFTTT and has good auto-opening performance
cons: The sensors for the door require a long wire strung across your garage space and can be tricky to align just right

customer_reviews.title: Brick
customer_reviews.text: Updating my original review: Every time a firmware update comes down, it bricks the device, and I have to leave it unplugged for a day or so to reset it. Last time, it died for good, even after being unplugged for a week, so I threw it out. It was great when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy waste of time and money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy!!!! Biggest piece of junk EVER!!!!!! I finally took a hammer to it. This piece of junk constantly kicks you off your WiFi and connects you to it. I only got it to open the garage one time. Yes it only worked once. I had amazon geeks and a professional garage door guy try to get this $100 piece of junk working. I called the company to walk me through it. Nobody could get this junk working. So just now after having this up and not working my phone connected to this piece of junks WiFi and kicked me off of what I was doing I finally figured out what to do...Smash it up and throw it away!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but falls short
customer_reviews.text: This is long overdue, but I love this device as it works flawlessly on the app when opening and closing, however, it stops there. Shortly after 1 year, of course after the warranty was up, the device basically stopped giving any notifications at all. The opening and closing notifications were the entire reason I bought this device. Nothing changed in the time that things stopped working. Update: as of 2020 I'm back using the device I've upped my rating to 4 stars as they provided me free replacement sensors as mine had gone out. Appreciate the assistance with this and this device still does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Controller

customer_reviews.title: It is a shame because they literally could get a much better quality sensor made and it would be a minimal ...
customer_reviews.text: The sensor for the device is very cheaply made and is unreliable. I average about 2 false reports per week that my garage door is open when it is in fact closed. I have made sure that it is installed correctly and the sensor is level as required. It is just a cheap sensor. It is a shame because they literally could get a much better quality sensor made and it would be a minimal cost to the company.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have two Nexx Garage openers now. One of them was not compatible with my Craftsman garage opener, but Nexx Support sent me a add-on device for free with instructions, and it took care of everything. I am a very happy customer. The New Nexx Home app works much better and has better features. I was not a big fan of the original Nexx Garage app though, so all good now.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Second one totally different experience
customer_reviews.text: I'm still sitting here trying to get it to complete the software routine. I bought one of these for one of my rentals because tenants lose garage remotes. That one went in without a problem. So I bought a second one for my other rental. I cannot get it to complete the software routine for connecting to wifi. I've been at it for 2 hours now.....still trying as I write this. It's got to work, every stinkin' time. The manual/on screen help for their connection routine is pretty poorly written. Yeah, this one will probably be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Rod M. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Better than MyQ
customer_reviews.text: Had the My Q for a week and the unit that goes on the garage door was faulty. So it would randomly open my garage door when I wasnt home, instead of doing its scheduled check to make sure its closed. I like this one way better because it's hard wired with magnetic sensors so less room for error and fault. Have had zero issues with it and it works really well. So much better of an option
customer_reviews.author: BradleyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The Nexx Garage door opener works great. Easy install and setting up on WiFi and the app was really easy. I have a Liftmaster and the wireless product (My Q) didn't work after several tries so I returned it. I saw the Nexx and thought I'd give it a try. I made sure my opener was compatible by using a small wire to jump across the connections on my wall switch. It opened the door so that showed it was compatible. I wish the wire with the sensor would have been a couple of feet longer as I have a 10 foot ceiling and the wire stretched with no an inch to spare. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: pjb

customer_reviews.title: App Update on 6/7/2019 Fixed Just Drive Bug
customer_reviews.text: I had someone install this, so I can't speak to that, other than to say that the installer stated that it was very easy, and the instructions were straight-forward. This device worked flawlessly, with the exception of the Just Drive feature, which worked intermittently, at best. However, after the app update on 6/7/2019, the Just Drive feature has worked each and every time, flawlessly and at the same distance from my garage door, no fewer than 12 times in a row. So, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schone

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!  I love this!!!  Best Customer Support!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME Product!!!! Easy set up. User Friendly. (WIN WIN WIN) I love this device. I spent some time looking at other products that allowed me to control my garage door from my phone and decided to go with NEXX, I'm glad I did!!! Customer Service is FANTASTIC! I had a minor issue, and Customer Service was incredibly fast to help me resolve my problem. Overall this has been the best customer service that I have ever experienced! I would HIGHLY recommend this for anyone that want to add convenience & security to your garage door opener.
customer_reviews.author: Sherpa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, really wanted item to work.
customer_reviews.text: Was very difficult to connect/set/pair with the router/internet. Then once finally sorta did, installed it, ran wires and then tried plugging back up to power up...and nothing. Product was dead. Maybe I just got a bad unit. Seller contacted me to check on product, told them about issue. Stated to contact CS trough their website for a replacement. No answer till this day. I would not purchase item again. Really wanted item to work in order to automate garage door. But no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Hardest part is just that all garage ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Hardest part is just that all garage doors aren't flat on top. Other than that I'd recommend getting the wifi and app all connected prior to installing it. It was a smaller device than what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Easy to setup with the App and Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: took me less than 20 minutes to install. some tie-wraps, a drill and a two or three outlet insert. age and nexx in the plug, tie-wrap the nexx to the garage assembly, run the wire down the track and secure along the way, drill in the contacts at the end to let you know when open and closed and your done. that easy, the app is very intuitive and easy to operate. I love the product and have it for both my garage doors. no more hassling with homelink or outdoor keypads. just want it for the iPhone watch to work and not just notify me, I am sure that is on its way
customer_reviews.author: The Law

customer_reviews.title: Download the Nexx Home app, printed instructions are outdated
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this on sale for Prime Day so I can't report on the longevity of this item. Install was a bit frustrating, largely because the instructions told us to download the wrong app. When we looked for support on the Nexx website it said we needed to download Nexx Home. So if you're having trouble that is something to try. I'm pretty excited about how well the app works now that we have Nexx installed. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Can't set up, so can't use
customer_reviews.text: At first it said I needed to update my firmware. So I tried, three times. After finishing updating it says I need to update again, so who knows if it every actually updated. Then I try to connect it to my wifi, and I get an error that says "Alert! You are not authorized to use this device." Well, that's it. I'm not sure why I'm not authorized to use my own garage door opener, but I'm definitely returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaolin Dave

customer_reviews.title: Liftmaster My Q
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item after reading reviews (an average of 4 stars) and finding out it was compatible with my Liftmaster My Q. Installed the system, which was pretty easy and the app. The app showed that the door was opening and closing when the manual button was pressed. The app just wouldn’t work. After hours of YouTube and trying different things it appears that my door requires an adapter. This would have been nice to know up front. The adapter has been out of stock on the main sight for over 8 months. Over all not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Poor Alexa integration... We need routines
customer_reviews.text: Update I have had 2 installed for 10 days now and the one closest to the hub has lost internet 3 times which means I have to get a ladder and climb up and cycle power to it for it to reconnect... Not sure why.... _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ I bought it to work with Alexa. It will open (with a spoken code) and close with alexa but I can't add to routines which is what I want. At end of night it locks my doors, turns off lights, and arms my ring security. I wanted it to also make sure garage doors are closed but it won't...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buggy, short sensor cord, save your money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing. This is one of the buggiest electronic items I have ever purchased. I returned to Amazon for refund. App covers screen with keyboard so you can't even see what you are typing. When entering a password for your home WiFi, leading letter is capitalized by app, so that needs a work around. Hung up updating unit. Took 3 tries to get unit programmed. Sensor cord is too short if your cord needs to run up to ceiling and across rather than down the center track.
customer_reviews.author: dJamison

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: This device is super overpriced. I think under the hood, it is a relay switch with a wired sensor. The price seems too high for the functionality it offers. The IFTTT integration is very basic. It does integrate with Alexa/Google home but I didn't try it. It offers two events for IFTTT: open and close. I bought it hoping to get better integration with IFTTT. The close garage door operation didn't do anything for me. Unfortunately there are not not much alternative in the market either. Other garage door openers are either not reliable in terms of quality or have sketchy subscription fee for IFTTT or other smart home platform integration.
customer_reviews.author: Shiblee Sadik

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible Very CompAtible With Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to sync with Alexa. The funny thing is, it shows as “Amazon’s Choice” and both Amazon and the Nexx Garage paperwork show that the devices are compatible. However, when you follow the instructions from Nexx Garage, it states to download the Nexx Garage skill from the Alexa App, but the skill does not exist. I lot of time spent on trying to sync. Nexx customer service was very responsive. They provided a link to the skill. I can now use voice controls but the commands are awkward compared to other devices. Also I can not see the device in the home devices within the Alexa app.
customer_reviews.author: William Raymor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: Good experience with this product so far. It is very easy to install. Download the mobile app and follow the instructions step by step, took me about 20 mins to set up. The wireless door sensor is much easier to install than the wired one from NXG-100. The app works great so far, with no delay and instant quick notification. Smart home integration works fine. The Alexa voice control requires pin code, which is a little bit annoying but works fine. Google Home and Siri work good. The price is a little bit high comparing other competitors. I will keep an eye on how long the door sensor battery will last. Overall, happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: Product not yet stabilized
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recall a more difficult to install and operate system. NOTHING was easy and in the end most things did not work. Tech support in the evenings is by email...expect 45 minute delays between replies . If you have daylight time, you can talk to tech support directly. My product was shipped defective HW. One key feature (geo fencing) was so unreliable, they terminated it for all users. Users must now formally / legally acknowledge that the system is unreliable in order to activate Just Drive. Geo fencing is not reliable in general. Nexx should not have Over promise / under deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ward

customer_reviews.title: Buy the wired sensors!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. The only thing I didn't like about it was the remote sensors for opening and closing. there was a very long delay in communicating with the app when the door was open or closed from those remote sensors. Those are the ones that had batteries in them and you mounted on the garage door. I decided to look around on eBay and I found some wired sensors that are compatible with the Nexx door system. It was well worth investing in the hardwired sensors. It took forever to make custom brackets for them but they work beautifully now, with an instant response!
customer_reviews.author: Matt West

customer_reviews.title: Frequent false alerts and reads
customer_reviews.text: This was a PAIN to set up. It took days and for me to disconnect other smart devices to do so. Didn't have that problem setting up any other device. Customer service was helpful though. After 6 months of use, it is declining in accuracy. For the past month it frequently says it's open when it's not. In the past 2 weeks I've seen it constantly say it's opening and closing when it's not moving at all. We've checked the sensors to ensure they are still positioned appropriately. I'm giving it 3 stars for working 70% of the time but the constant false alerts saying it's opening and shutting is alarming and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Worked great for 5 months, then bang! The device stays disconnected from WiFi, even with “Excellent” signal strength. As for support, forget about it. I asked what they changed that caused their product/service to break almost overnight. Of course, they didn’t change anything...it must be my wireless setup that changed. Round and round we go. So...what’s the solution? Just power cycle, right? Haha. You wish. Nope. Need to completely delete the device, reinstall it, re-pair it to the door sensor, etc. etc. And that works for maybe a day. Then rinse and repeat. But remember, all this is due to the wireless setup changing on my side, right Nexx?
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Peace of mind and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Like others I had a difficult time installing with the included hardware. I had the piece that goes on the garage fall off after about a week, so I superglued it on and it has worked flawlessly since. I especially love the open by proximity feature as it works well. Sometimes too well as it will open when I’m driving past my house a block away. Luckily I can just open the app and close the garage without an issue. Alexa works well with it, however, I wish I didn’t have to say “Ask Nexx Garage to .....” before opening, closing, or getting the status of the door. Other than that it works.
customer_reviews.author: L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but stopped working. Customer service poor.
customer_reviews.text: First, the instructions for pairing are very vague and found it difficult to pair with wifi. Once I did get it paired it worked great at first. Everything was operational but the auto open feature was hit-and-miss. After the first year of use it started to malfunction and I would have to continually re-pair the unit by unplugging and replugging it per customer service instructions. As of December 2018 it completely stopped working. It will not pair, or even reset. The green light just stays solid green always. Customer service is almost non-existent. I've tried to find a contact number to talk directly to a human but there doesn't seem to be one. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trekker57

customer_reviews.title: Great support for a solid product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product for our last house and after some tweaking it worked like a charm. THe tweat was likely the result of a weak WiFi signal. We moved and our new home had a MyQ Liftmaster set up. Neither the old owner or I could get it to connect to the home internet. Chamberlain tech support was not helpful. So I dusted off and retrieved this unit. Nexx did not natively support the LiftMaster opener with MyQ yet Nexx Support was was responsive and quick. They quickly sent an adapter at no charge and it was a ten minute fix. The NEXX System works well and I would heartily recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Woloszyn

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a 5 star review. "easy set up, works 100% of time. great alerts. Way better than Chamberlain MyQ (which I returned)" 5 weeks later the unit stopped working and although customer support has been responsive, it still isn't working. Worst of all I missed my window to return the item so I'm stuck with a 100+ paperweight. Steer clear of this product. there was a software update that once it was resolved I have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Wish I'd found the Nexx sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. Devices like this usually fail to meet expectations. In this case, it exceeds them. Easy to install, with detailed, well written English instructions. I love the "open upon approach" feature. I have LED lighting around my house, so my garage door remote doesn't always work without getting out of the truck and walking right up to the garage door. Really annoying. The Nexx has an "auto open" feature that will open the garage door as you're pulling up, so you can pull right in. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DFW Data Services (Corey Bryant)

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!  Auto-open is the best feature!
customer_reviews.text: For those times when you second guess yourself about closing the garage door, this is a valuable device to have along with the app on your smart phone. Install is very straight forward and the customer service is top notch. I had to replace my door operator with a new unit and the Nexx device wasn't compatible. Nexx sent me an adapter at no charge that restored the functionality. The coolest thing is the geo-fencing that opens your door for you at a predetermined distance. You'll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: Compatible with. my ancient Overhead Received promptly. Easy istallation of the device. Some difficulty attaching the sensor to the garage door because the edge of my door is curved requiring some spacer to prop the sensor mounting bracket. App function well, Siri integration is a bonus. Will be tasing the geofencing feature shortly. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Med A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the geofencing and auto-open feature
customer_reviews.text: Did take longer than the 30 minutes claimed in the instructions, had to contact Nexx support, and they responded quickly. Had to use multi-tool to cut an indention into my garage door header to mount the sensor. I ended up using crimp-on spade connectors to connect wires to my garage door opener. Too much of a hassle three wires to stay on the post as I was tightening the screw down. Absolutely love the geofencing and auto-open feature. I recently had a metal roof installed and that interfered with my old remote. Had to drive half way up my driveway before the remote would open door. Now as I pull into the driveway, the door automatically opens! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robsan19

customer_reviews.title: Simple and quick install, but the door sensor made me use pirate language
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 30 minutes to install the components and get this online. Then it took another hour to get the sensor adjusted so the system could tell me if the door was open or closed. I think nuclear bombs require less precision in assembly. UPDATE: I contacted customer support to let them know the door close indicator wasn’t reliable. They pushed out a firmware update, and all is well. Don’t spend lots of time trying to get the perfect distance in the sensor. Contact customer support quickly. They are super responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Prol

customer_reviews.title: Alexa integration is limited!
customer_reviews.text: This system does not support Alexa Routines, so you have to separately tell it to close your garage door when you come home, rather than integrating it into an "I'm home" routine or similar. I tried to go around and use IFTTT to integrate it. They don't support that either. Their "Works with Alexa" claim is not entirely true.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Andrew Martin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: First the magnetic switch did not work. I contacted customer service and let them know and they just kept asking me to check the switch and verify if it was working, so no help from them. I ended up buying another magnetic switch and that got it to work. Then it took forever to get the device to connect as it apparently does not like to be connected to the 5Ghz band, got it to connect to the 2ghz band. 3 weeks ago, it quit working. I have tried and tried to get it to connect and I just keep getting an error......this is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Gasworks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the good. The device is easy to install and basic set up. That's it. It went down hill from there. First, Google Home integration never worked. Tried everything. Even their support that was slow and insufficiently trained, couldn't figure it out. Then Auto-Open started to fail that it won't work anymore. Supoort never got back to me on that one. Finally it started to report the door was open when it was actually closed and viceversa. I really wanted this thing to work. Don't waste yout money. Wait for a reliable manufacture to develop the tech.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan French

customer_reviews.title: iOS auto open barely works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is good for manual operation and getting push notifications but don’t expect it to open the door for yo automatically if you have an iPhone. I think it worked once or twice for me and that was the end of it. I don’t think functionality should be claimed when it clearly isn’t consistent. As far as I can tell, it’s actually a limitation of iOS preventing it from getting location data so I’m not sure why they advertise it works. Maybe it did with older versions of iOS? Anyways, if you buy it content with that limitation then it’s definitely a good “smart” opener with no monthly fees required.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: To be clear I got the NXG-200. A lot of older reviews are describing issues pertaining to Alexa commands. I'm happy to say they have worked out all the kinks. I can say "Alexa, open the garage" (followup with garage code), "Alexa, close the garage" (followup with garage code), and "Alexa, is my garage open?" provided you have named it "garage". Same goes for Siri, you use the Shortcuts app in iOS to create the commands, I can say "Hey Siri, open the garage", "Hey Siri, is my garage open?", etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Both my wife and I love having this system and I can't say enough about ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, our garage door unit wasn't compatible with the Nexx Garage door opener. Nexx went of their way trying to help us figure out a work around. The service department stayed in touch with us weekly to see if our problem was solved. Finally and to my surprise, Nexx went ahead and developed a patch unit that made our older unit work with the Nexx app and receiver. They sent us the patch unit free of charge. SAY WHAAT!! Yep, they did. Who does this anymore? Both my wife and I love having this system and I can't say enough about the support team. Way to go Nexx!!!
customer_reviews.author: Proflee

customer_reviews.title: Sensor on LOWER 1/3, NOT top.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue was with the wireless sensor. It kept failing to register the door closed. I followed the instructions and put it on the top 1/3 of the garage door, reposition, etc. Maybe would work for couple of days. On a whim, I move the sensor to the LOWER 1/3 section of the door and wow, it has worked great for for couple of months now. The automatically opening of the door based on GPS location (BETA VERSION) still not working that great with Android Samsung Galaxy s7.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Can't Believe I Didn't Buy One Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about two weeks now and it's been amazing. I ordered a keypad for my Genie opener, and it would lose connection at least once a week, leaving my kids stranded more than once. I can now see if they leave the door open when they head out for school, and can close it from anywhere. Installation took all of 10 minutes. I have an iPhone, and I read about possible issues with the Android App, so maybe that's where some negative reviews come from. Flawless for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: richard plecenik

customer_reviews.title: Works great once set up correctly
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 issues installing this product. One was the installation of the door sensor. I had installed it the best way for my door but had forgotten that since the sensor is a magnet, polarity mattered. When the sensor was installed ‘attracting’ rather than ‘opposing’ then the sensor worked fine. However, the instructions I had did not cover this. Second, the unit would not work so I contacted customer service. It turned out a wire connection was broken and I was promptly sent a new unit. Has worked fine ever since. My daughter now uses her cell phone to open and close the garage door.
customer_reviews.author: eagle251

customer_reviews.title: Great, fairly easy to install and works great with my 2009 chamberlain
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to figure out the instructions for the sensor. I have a metal garage door so pre-drilling holes in it helped. Once the sensor was on, I would suggest running the cable up the wall and on the ceiling with some tacks. Strangely the schedulint options didn’t show up until a day later. It will notify you every 15min you leave the door open unless you turn that piece off. I also have it scheduled to close the door every day at 11p as a failsafe. Overall, works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to install - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised and as I was needing. It was easy to install (less than an hour and if you know what you're doing, 10 minutes) and works like a charm. I do wish for two changes in the app however... 1) the notifications (open/close) become local to the app install, not for the "account" (e.g. changing it on phone also changes it on tablet and I don't want on both), and 2) the ability to control the notification sound (it only allows the default system sound); I would like to distinguish the garage from a regular text, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark's valuable input

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional, cheap, and amazing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple setup. Install the app and sign up for an account (did prior to arrival), link it to the device on your home network (ensure you’re using 2.4 network), install the sensor (if you’re even slightly handy this is easy), plug it in, install the Nexx garage skill for Alexa (in the Alexa app), and tell her to open your garage. So far so good... only slight negative is it take sometimes up to a minute to show closed status, but in fairness it has to wait for the door to fully close to align the sensor to report it closed and then make it across the inter-webs to the app.
customer_reviews.author: Long Hair Girl

customer_reviews.title: Broken - could not connect to the device to configure it
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Nexx to get support, and they recommended a few different things to try (cycle the power, reset, wipe out the WiFi network on my phone and re-add it, try a different phone, try a laptop... Nothing worked. Green light, but it would never establish a connection. Unfortunately, I didn't try to set this up until after the Amazon return window was over, so I'm out the full amount. Nexx said that since I bought it from Amazon, I would have to process my return through Amazon. Not helpful. I don't always run out and install everything within the return window. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not flashy, but totally functional.
customer_reviews.text: Being my first foray into smart home tech, I read many reviews before deciding on the Nexx over the competing tech from the company that made my opener. That had me well prepared for the extra bit of work to mount the device with a custom bracket. Despite discovering that my opener model was not listed as compatible (my fault for not checking first), the simple test suggested in the package showed that it would indeed work and it did! Setup was a breeze and it has functioned as well as I could have hoped ever since. The app isn't flashy, but functional.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kloepper

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Having to order this adapter crap for backwards compatibility is a decision they have to be regretting at this company's headquarters. I have one thing to say to Nexx: Build. The adapter. Into. Your product. Yeah? No one wants to order your garage door opener, mess with it, then realize it doesn't work, then have some adapter sent out by customer service via USPS which took 1 month, now have to pull it all back out and mess with it again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor support
customer_reviews.text: The unit works nice afetr it gets configured. The boxes are shippen without the MAC address required for those WLAN using MAC FILTER. The support team is almost useless as they don't provide a way to obtain the MAC address from the unit before hand. I managed to get the MAC address connecting the unit to an unfiltered router (which is not really an option in most cases). For those units not compatible, it is required to to submot the remote control to the manufacturer so they can insert a bridge. I managed to do it by myself so I saved variouse weeks of wait time.
customer_reviews.author: Elpidio Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome product. It’s hard to believe but it makes opening your garage even easier. Drive up, it opens, tell Alexa to close it, it closes. Sometimes there is a little lag and you may have to wait 15 seconds for it to open but that is maybe 1/15 times. Can’t remember if you closed it? Check the app from anywhere. I have a plug in car and the one “modification” I had to make was to mount the sensors on an angle so that they properly show the door closed when the cord is under the door. It’s pretty touchy about the open/closed sensor and when it will register closed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit temperamental with Siri and with the Geo-fence (to know you're entering your area to automatically open your garage door). When the Geo-fence does work, it's cool to have my garage door open knowing I'm driving up in a few moments. Overall, it's a pretty cool device. My favorite function is if someone forgets to close the garage door (after fifteen minutes), it will send a alert to your phone so you can close the garage it from the app.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in LA

customer_reviews.title: The customer service can only be reached via email which is very annoying. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Received one devise and it was defective, the devise could not pick any wifi networks. Then I received a second devise and the second did pick up wifi networks but could not connect to them. All other devices in my house work without any issue. The customer service can only be reached via email which is very annoying. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alex vaynrokh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!  Glad I waited and kept searching.
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT product. I searched for compatible garage door devices only to hesitate purchase because this or that did not quite seem right or the best it could be. I then found this product on AMAZON. I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED. This device could not be easier to install. Follow the directions and in 30 minute or less, we were in business. The trickiest part is the magnetic sensor for the door open/closed. There are many different doors so it can be tricky. With a little thought and ingenuity it can work out just fine. Follow the diagrams and read the instructions. THIS IS AN AWESOME DEVICE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased and returned another company product out of frustration. but this one works as advertised. not really that hard to install. only wish it integrated with alexa a bit better (I think that's on the alexa side. you have to say "alexa, tell nexx home to open garage" - then it prompts for a code (not a problem). wish I could just say "alexa open garage", but you can't since it's a skill not a list. using the app to open/close is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it works, Sometimes it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's great, but it works so intermittently that you cannot depend on this thing. I bought it to integrate with Smart Things so that if we accidentally left the garage door open, I could close it remotely. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. The problem seems to be on Nexx's cloud services. Sometimes there are long delays before the door is opened, sometimes it doesn't work at all. I can't recommend this due to the instability. On the plus sid, installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: The Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Buy the wired sensor
customer_reviews.text: This device does pretty well for what it's worth. I would strongly recommend buying the wired door sensor from their website as the wireless sensor wouldn't recognize the door position had changed, and when it does so it's only after a long delay. The wired sensor immediately knows if the door is open or closed. Only disappointment is that the wired sensor isn't included in the initial order and has to be purchased separately. I would have preferred to have gotten the wired sensor and then ordered wireless separately if I wanted it. Having only the wireless unit at first almost caused me to return the item due to it's occasional failure to recognize the door position.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Just drive feature is flaky
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for basic functions like Alexa and iPhone app. However, I can get those functions from a much less expensive unit. The big feature that led me to buy was the geofencing, which is very unreliable. I’d guess it works half the time. There was a recent update to the app that now lists the just drive feature as “beta”. It wasn’t listed as beta in the app when I first installed it and it isn’t mentioned in the description so I assume the change was due to issues with the feature.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Had it six months, now it will not sync properly spent an hour or so on resets etc. The super unfortunate thing is the lack of support, limited online information and limited frequently asked questions. I likely have fixable issue. I cannot get fixed because there is not much information online and no manual included. Would love to have it fix or refunded, but 6 months is well past that date. Maybe there was a warranty I could have purchased. I would suggest purchasing that. This appears to be a up and coming issue with these.
customer_reviews.author: brody

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely eliminate your feeling of, "did I leave the garage door open?". Once the mobile phone app has been configured, it opens my garage door when I get to my driveway. It also sends me an alert when my garage door has been opened or closed. The installation was a snap using their support videos. Their support is awesome! I emailed them with a configuration issue. Within an hour I had response from their support answering my questions. I would not hesitate in recommending this product. It does as described (and more)!
customer_reviews.author: RCG Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this device. It was reasonably straightforward to install (it's not going to be super simple, but it was about as easy as it could be I think) and has been very reliable. I've not had any problems with it and love getting the alerts every time the garage door is opened or closed. I had a little trouble before I installed it testing the door detector out but the customer service was very responsive (issue was me I think).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Muckle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.text: This was working well when it was first bought. Great features. But a few weeks later, problems started. It would not update in my app. It would show that it was closed but the actual door was open. So I did reinstall the app, rebooted and reseted the device as well. Did not work. Customer service advised me to get the new app, still didn't work. After 13 emails back and forth, I gave up. It lost its wifi connectivity somehow. Even triple checked all my router and the rest of my smart devices worked fine. If you like getting frustrated, yes then buy it. Get the Chamberlain instead...more consistent and at least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Allan P

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: The Nexx Garage sensors were very easy to install and connecting it to my wifi network went smoothly (suggest that you connect to your wifi network while inside your home, instead of in your garage), where the signal is strongest. So far the notifications to my phone when the garage is open have been reliable. I have also been able to open and close the garage from the app without any issues. So far all is working well. My only concern is that the Android app has not been updated in a long time. This worries me about long term app support and development. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to setup.
customer_reviews.text: So awful and useless. After spending an hour trying the first step over and over...resetting the device each time...I finally got it to connect to wifi. Then I spent the next 30 minutes trying to get it to see the door sensor. Finally I thought it was ready to install in my garage bit then I get a "cloud error" and my device disappeared from the app. Now it won't see it again. Cheap Chinese junk that's going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to set up, works with Mighty Mule gate opener on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I rigged the Mighty Mule gate opener to remotely open and close my dog kennel. This allows me to let my dog out or keep him when I'm gone for the day or weekend.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Smartthings Integration FAIL
customer_reviews.text: I can not connect this device to Smartthings. If this is what you are planning on doing, do NOT buy this product. I have spend countless hours between Samsung (Smartthings) and Nexx support. They both point fingers at each other and while they are "partners" they rely on you (the customer) to be the conduit between them to solve any issues. I'm at my wits end and ready to sell this device. They have not been able to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: locochristopher

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year of use..
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the unit while it lasted (about a year). The internal relay or transistor which controls the on/off for the garage door no longer functions. The device still works as an indicator for if the garage door is open or closed. However it is unable to control the garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They work as advertised. I like the notifications. I have 2 separate garage doors. After using one on the main garage with good result, I bought another one. I have Marantec garage openers. It helped that I still have original installation manual for it. It showed me clearly where to connect this adapter. The trick is to figure out where to route and install the sensor. My opener has a solid top surface covering the belt. I just used that to route it to the garage door. I used double sided tape to secure to sensors, but I may come back to screw them in later. They work fine as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bluenycom

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to always be paranoid if I remembered to close my garage or not. Now I can check it from anywhere rather than call my neighbors to check for me. I use the Alexa and Google integration a lot. Works great. It's nice to have piece of mind knowing my garage is closed and being able to open it from anywhere if someone needs me to is great. I didn't know how much I needed this. After getting this I see there are many other brands now, but this one worked perfectly for my Genie rolling code door.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J. Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have done a better job at lining up magnets (picture) and I tested the magnets before I installed (they worked for a brief moment). However this over waste of time continued to tell me my garage was open when it clearly wasn't. Next also has no phone number for support, you'll have to email them. It's much more efficient to return this piece of crap and save any future headache. My night is shot as well as my patience.
customer_reviews.author: Hevans

customer_reviews.title: Very buggy, I question whether it is ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product, when it works it is dead on and a joy to use. The problem is it may work today and not work tomorrow. When it is working it will proceed to open my garage door approximately two houses down before I get home. So far this week it has only worked twice out of six times. Voice recognition is in desperate need of attention it may work once out of 20 times. The other frustrating point is there is no phone number to contact anyone! Possibly these could be corrected if there was a technical support person available.
customer_reviews.author: SMJP

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the Nexx garage door opener for about six months and I’ve been very happy with it. Is it perfect? No, but I don’t have a smart home device that is. I haven’t had any of the issues that others have reported like random openings or false notifications. If I have any criticisms it’s the UI of the app feels a little dated, but I am a designer and I’m sure the average user wouldn’t notice it. My advice. Get it, watch the installation videos and read the instructions before you start trying to install and you should be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and no more wondering
customer_reviews.text: We love our Nexx wifi device. Several times a month I will forget if I closed the garage door or not, I wanted one of the new wifi openers, but ours is only a few years old and works fine, so I got the Nexx and it has worked out well for us. I did just have one issue when the software would report the door was open when it was closed. I emailed customer support and they got back to me with a fix in minutes! I was very surprised at how fast they responded. I no longer have to wonder if I closed the door or not!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wags

customer_reviews.title: Device is not ready for prime-time
customer_reviews.text: I installed this device under the guidance that this device was compatible with Smartthings. After over 45 days of discussions with tech support, the auto-open functionality with Smartthings does not work. What's more, the auto-open feature in the device app is flawed. Tech support washed their hands of the issue saying that it was an iphone issue or a smartthings issue, which I had proven was not the case. Now I am just waiting for a return to be authorized so I can get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this - but the reason I bought it wasn't working
customer_reviews.text: The install took 2-3 hours as I had staples and screws at my house. I tried to use the screws that were included and the that went into the garage door would not work. The app is slow - 3-4 seconds after hitting the button the door would open/close. I wanted this for the ability to drive home and drive up to my garage door and have the app open the garage door automatically. This did not work - so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: M Jenck

customer_reviews.title: Better than MyQ
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail had to do some research prior to setting up. Only because I was using this on an entry gate with a doorking DKS motor. Found out what I needed to connect to where and installing this was a breeze. Now I can grant access to guests without giving the code away to everyone. Still working on all the settings and the Alexa integration could be better. I wish you didn't have to say such a long phrase to open the gate and you also have to use a passcode.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Turner

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install. It does have a few limitations.
customer_reviews.text: The install took a little adjusting to get the sensors lined up perfectly. I used some fatter screws to better secure it. Otherwise it was an easy install. It works well with Alexa. I do have an integrated WiFi opener on another door. That one works better, because it knows more accurately if it's opening/shutting. This one relies on the sensor- so if that were to fall off when you're away, it would say the door was open. Then remotely pushing close would actually open the door. Just an observation. So make sure you secure it well and don't use that silly mounting tape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This device does not work with mesh routers at all. I had a different router before that couldn't get it installed. Tried and extender and still kept dropping. Then tried mesh they say they don't support. They send a return shipping that didn't work. Ups store says they sent it but the tracking never went active. It's too late for refund. Don't bother wasting your time.
customer_reviews.author: Omazing Kudos

customer_reviews.title: Simple install. Great functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install. The sensor was easy to mount on top of the garage door with the supplied plastic bracket. Wiring the sensor and running the cable along the garage ceiling was very simple. Only drawback is the somewhat lengthy Alexa command, "Alexa ask nexx garage" needed to make it do thinks. Would have been nice to just say open garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Grindborg

customer_reviews.title: Works, I like it. But....
customer_reviews.text: Some issues. If you have a metal garage, you can't just stick it to the garage. you have to build a wooden contraption to keep it several inches away from the garage door. About once or twice a week I'll get a notification that the garage is opening or closing when it isn't. My guess is that's because of the sensor mis reading. If it were to actually open and close my garage on it's own, that would be a serious problem.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: Open your garage remotely
customer_reviews.text: As a busy family who is constantly on the go, we spent much time debating whether or not we closed the garage door. Worry no more. This is a fantastic product. With a quick download to our phones we can see when the door is open or closed. Alerts remind us when the garage door remains open for an extended period of time. And best yet, we can open and close remotely from our phones for family or repair companies. Lost one star because the auto open feature is hit or miss. Sometimes the door opens when I drive up, sometimes it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation. Easy install. Gr8 features.!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install. Some people make a big deal about mounting the door contact but if you look at the 2 L brackets they give you to install it, there are numerous variations and configurations to use. Surely one will work for almost any application. Only glitch is you have to download the Nexx Home app on phone and activate both the Nexx Home and Nexx Garage skill on your Alexa account to give voice command control to the door via Echo, Dot, etc. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy
customer_reviews.text: No more coming home to a still open garage door! My only problem at all with installing this was my WIFI routers problem with the password. Which seems to happen with everything new on first connection. Wired into my door opener (Genie 2028) with no problem. The Nexx home app synced and connected easily with my android phone and Alexa. Nice to be able to open my garage door from anywhere with my phone. Money well spent in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Crippen

customer_reviews.title: It works! And works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to set it up. Thanks for the support team! Now everything is working as should. Also I didn't trust the plastic sensor it came with (and installation of it it's a real pain! ). My advice: if you're experiencing any problems with your "Nexx Garage opener " send them a direct email or through the app support link. In my case I got responses immediately or in the matter of 12 hours. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Bykov

customer_reviews.title: Can be dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 2 years. In general, it works well. There are two issues. First, it regularly delays 5-10 seconds from the time you trigger the door using the app. Second, the auto feature delays up to 20 seconds. This creates dangerous situation in that if you trigger the door again manually in the app, the door may open then in 5-10 seconds close by itself. For that, it gets 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected but auto door open feature is broken.
customer_reviews.text: The device is a straight forward install. The only tedious part is aligning and installing the sensors. The only reason I am giving it 3 stars is the geofencing auto door open does not work. In their support documentation it states that it depends on the cell towers and other location tracking settings. My Google maps accurately shows my home location on my Pixel2 phone. I only had this device for a couple of days. I will change this review if Nexx customer support resolves this issue. They got back to me almost instantly on a couple of other questions I had but claim they have a known problem with the Android Oreo and are working to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Baliboy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service to overcome the potential installation hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Needed a product to tell me if the garage door is left open. This delivers. Initial setup was a bit trying, but it turns out I needed an adapter. Customer service responded quickly and sent one for free. It paired up after a few tries and now works just as expected. It's a relief to know if I left the garage door open, and to just ask siri to open or close the door. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DudeBro

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Install.
customer_reviews.text: Super Easy Install. So far it's working better than the cheaper one I had that wouldn't connect to my guest network and never stayed connected to wifi. I still cannot figure out how to get the Bluetooth to connect for when the wifi is not working. For some reason I'm not getting the option to add pictures. I read somewhere that you have to have so many words so now I am typing for no reason other than to be allowed to add pictures books blablabla.
customer_reviews.author: TJO

customer_reviews.title: Love my smart opener!
customer_reviews.text: The initial setup in the app and linking it to your WiFi could be smoother, I suggest doing all this prior to installing as the unit just needs to be plugged in and not attached to the opener. I did it at the kitchen table. Attaching it to the garage opener is SUPER easy. There are stick on tabs and enough wire so the unit can be affixed to the side or front of the opener, and the wireless sensor attaches to the top of the garage door with provided Velcro tab. Works just as advertised, I can even operate from my iwatch or Alexa. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lhorn2000

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone with a garage door opener!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and setup. Took probably 30 minutes total from start to finish. Gives you the ability to see if your garage is open or closed, tracks all of the openings and closings along with telling you who did it and at what time. And gives you the capability to open and close your door from anywhere as long as you have an internet connection. Works flawlessly with both android and apple. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: Watching tutorials helped but it is easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and this took me an hour to do including watching the installation videos and the physical work. I also didn't need to buy anything extra? I mounted everything with the included double sided tape including the non wired sensor on garage door. The wired sensor I did screw to the wall. I am not sure why people have a hard time? Works great opens quick. Hasn't been working with the auto location detection to open it 70 meters away but I'll keep trying. Wish it had an android widget that displayed open and close instead of opening the app to do it. Easy set up. Works flawless.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation. Works great! I spliced in my own pre-existing hidden/recessed door sensor rather than using the one shipped with the product, as it was already installed and invisible. Some features they need to add: 1. They need to add web page / browser access. Most other WiFi appliance vendors (e.g Orbit sprinkler controller, Samsung webcam) have this. 2. An auto-close feature with programmable delay and active time of day schedule needs to be added. "Auto-close" listed in the event log.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: The support team deserves a 6 star rating
customer_reviews.text: I installed the product on a commercial roll up door necessitating the purchase of a different door sensor ($17). After hooking everything up and troubleshooting a problem with the door unrelated to the Nexx unit the support team sent got me going by making suggestions that worked and the system is solid. VERY happy with the product. Great support. If I had a normal residential garage door it would have worked with the instructions that came with he unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Caley

customer_reviews.title: It worked Great with my old Garage Door
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product and read the manual about the compatibility. I was worry because my old garage door is not on the list. Luckily that I passed the compatibility test. It's easy to install both hardware and software. Worked Great! Great functions too. After I tried to test the rest of the functions. 1. I couldn't use the Drive in ...It couldn't automatically open the garage. 2. Alexa couldn't locate the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product helped decrease my commute time. Every morning ...
customer_reviews.text: This product helped decrease my commute time. Every morning we'd have to wait to ensure the garage door closed. Otherwise my husband would worry that it stayed open while we were gone all day. No matter that I could see that the door had closed. This was the cause of many a morning argument. This gadget has SOLVED that worry and sped up our morning commute. It has even caused my husband to start turning on his phone's ringer - another source of frustration. But the notification beep when the door is closed (or open) is a very reassuring noise as well as argument avoider!
customer_reviews.author: ANN E CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: super convenient
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this for some months and I love it. it was fairly simple to install and set up. i have an old garage, but it had no issues connecting and controlling it. i downloaded the app onto two phones and it works great, as long as the opener is connected to the internet in the house. i can monitor if the garage was opened or closed. if someone needs to get in the house, i can open the garage from work or anywhere as long as i have internet. i love this gadget and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a short time, day's and used it twice. I am notorious for leaving my garage open and leaving. LIKE: so far it works well. At least when my neighbor callls to tell me I left it open again, I can close it. Recomment to manufacture: 1. more options for mounting the Door open/close sensors. I could not solid mount them as they would hit each other. I mounted mine on teh chain tube iwth large wire ties. 2. a more obvious (door open) alarm, or I don't understand the set up. I thought it would alarm me. 3. Does not connect with Alexa, :-(
customer_reviews.author: Earl Duskey

customer_reviews.title: Not without hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Not as quick and easy as many reviewers alluded to. Instructions were ok ... I used Sugru to attach both sensors and it proved a very quick and easy way to affix them. The top of my garage door angles away from the wall beam, so I simply built up a wad of Sugru and alleviated the angling. Set-up in the app went smoothly, but my ECHO Plus ALWAYS insists the door is closed ... Even when it is open although the app icon on my phone always shows the correct door position. Therefore ~ whether I need to open or close the door, I have to tell Alexa to "open the door" - which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on January 2017, stop working on May 2017. I didnt get the extended warranty so i am out of $100. Realy worked great all alone. I disconnected it as instructed, and reconnected it, but the blue light does not come on. I will try another brand. 7/6/17 = Just emailed support on my defective device and quickly received a reply apologizing for my inconvenience. They are sending me another nexx garage door opener and i could not be happier. I upgrade my rating to 4 star due to customer service quick solution. I should have emailed them all alone. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ezwithme3

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wifi garage door opener was pretty easy to install, 20 minutes tops. Worked on the first try. Watch the youtube video first to get an idea on how it works, then grab your step ladder. I installed it on a 12 yr old chamberlin garage door opener. This wifi garage door opener does not require a monthy subscription like some other openers do. The app works just fine on the iPhone, it’s got some pretty intuitive features like reminds you via text if u left the garage door open. You can close or open the garage from anywhere you have cellular reception. I’m pretty happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Ronquillo

product_meta.title: NEXX Garage NXG-100 NXG Remote Compatible Door Openers - Control Using Smart Phone, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant Enabled Devices, White
product_meta.description: Color Name:WhiteNexx Garage is a companion device to an existing garage door opener that securely allows one or more users to open, close, and monitor their garage door from anywhere in the World. This smart device will allow you to control your garage door opener with your smartphone, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant enabled devices, or just driving your car.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENTLY OPEN AND CLOSE your garage door by turning your existing Wi-Fi network and garage door opener into a single integrated smart device that you can control and monitor from anywhere.

ACTIVATE YOUR GARAGE DOOR OPENER BY TAPPING on the Next Home mobile app, or by giving voice commands to your Alexa, Siri, or Google Assistant devices, automate with SmartThings, or by driving near your garage door.

MULTI-USER ACCESS & REMOTE MONITORING. You can authorize multiple people to access your garage, you can open and close the door if a guest arrives and you're away, and you can receive notifications if you forget to close the door.
BEST IN CLASS SECURITY ENCRYPTION: reliable and secure with real-time activity logging; and only one controller per garage door opener, you can easily monitor activity.
COMPATIBLE WITH MOST EXISTING GARAGE DOOR OPENERS: Please check or test compatibility BEFORE purchasing by following the instructions in the image gallery.
NEXX REQUIRES a 2. 4 GHZ WIFI CONNECTION and offers quick and easy installation without the need for a professional.

specifications.Included Components: Sticker, Wires, Screws, Controller, wired sensor, brackets, stickers, screws, wire, manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,006 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
